personalInfo.name: Shashank Kumar
personalInfo.title: AI Systems Engineer | Full-Stack Developer | AI Training Specialist
personalInfo.tagline: Available for worldwide freelance and contract engagements

professionalSummary: AI Systems Engineer and Full-Stack Developer with 4+ years of experience architecting intelligent systems and scalable applications. Delivered measurable impact by improving model safety by 25%, building AI agents with 85% task accuracy, and engineering solutions that drove 150% client growth. Combines expertise in LLM fine-tuning, multi-agent architecture, and production-grade deployment.

technicalSkills.AI/ML: OpenAI API, Hugging Face, LLM Evaluation, RLHF

experience.company: Contract for AI Research Platforms (via Upwork, Outlier, OneForma)
details: Improved model safety scores by 25% by designing and executing 500+ adversarial prompts for red-teaming frontier LLMs.
Accelerated data pipeline efficiency by 30% by creating annotation scripts and ontology systems for 10,000+ multilingual NLP samples, maintaining 98% QA accuracy.
Trained and evaluated 3+ major LLMs on reasoning and code-generation tasks, directly contributing to production release cycles.
Consistently rated Top Performer (top 5%) across 1,000+ complex evaluation tasks.
Annotated and QA-validated 10,000+ multilingual NLP training samples, speech recognition, and voice AI systems with 98% accuracy rate.
Designed and implemented ontology management systems for optimizing LLM and voice AI training data consistency and quality across multiple domains.
Led prompt complexity evaluation initiatives and metadata accuracy reviews for frontier AI models, improving model alignment and safety.
Conducted specialized voice annotation for speech-to-text and voice recognition models across 20+ languages.
Conducted LLM evaluation and fine-tuning for conversational AI applications, focusing on response quality, safety alignment, and user satisfaction metrics.
Developed comprehensive training protocols for prompt engineering, model ranking, and AI alignment workflows based on industry best practices.
Completed 500+ evaluation tasks with zero rejections, earning Top Performer status.
Designed and built 30+ custom WordPress and Webflow websites integrated with AI chatbot solutions, CRM systems, and advanced automation workflows.
Developed full-stack applications using Python, Flask, JavaScript, React, and Node.js from database schema to responsive frontend deployment with 99% uptime.
Implemented advanced SEO strategies resulting in 150% organic traffic growth for 20+ client projects.
Automated 500+ customer service and business workflows using n8n, REST APIs, and third-party integrations, processing 1000+ monthly transactions.

projects.name: Verdant AI: Multi-Agent Orchestration System

projects.description: High-performance multi-agent orchestration system designed for complex problem-solving domains including physics simulation, time-series forecasting, and autonomous code generation. Production-grade system.
bullets: Router-Delegate Architecture with central intelligence engine routing tasks to specialized micro-agents
Robust Adapter Pattern wrapping complex research modules in fault-tolerant adapters for stability
Micro-Agent Swarm with specialized agents for Coding, Mathematics, Creative Writing, Web Research, and Physics Simulation
Full-Stack Implementation with FastAPI backend, Next.js 14 frontend, Docker containerization, and microservices

Decision-Making AI with advanced behavior modeling using conditional branching and emotion trees
